p: The in-vitro study was performed to estimate lipoxygenases (LOX) inhibitory activity of Zanthoxylum armatum crude alkaloids. Lipoxygenases (5-LOX) enzymes are responsible for the conversion of arachidonic acid into the potent bioactive inflammatory mediator such as leukotrienes, thromboxanes, and prostaglandins ( Shrivastava etÂ al., 2017).
